TopicTitle: Preventing the regeneration of the building damage

Articles.Content:
In this current version(0.25) a building damage stack for a brief period(5 sec or so I *think*) but regenerate after that.

This request is for a mod that would prevent that regeneration: which mean that if you crash small debris on the VAB it will eventually collapse even if the debris are too small to make it collapse in one go.

It would add realism as a building doesn't magically repair itself as long as it's not destroyed.

Thank you for reading!
